message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $70 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $90 might be a bit high, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $82.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $75 for the product.

I understand that $75 is still a bit below my target, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $80.50. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $78 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $79.50. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $78.50 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than this, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer it to you for $79.25. This is my final offer.
